Desktop notifications will not be spoken

Speaker will not tell you about incoming calls

Speaker will announce even if headphones are not plugged in

Speaker will not lower the volume at all
Speaker is disabled and will not speak anything

Speaker will not announce things by other apps

Create a custom script to be read when you are called

Speaker will only speak incoming call alerts once (if enabled)

Speaker will not speak while your phone is in silent
